award_title: Collaborative Research: eMB: Weak Form Scientific Machine Learning of Mechanisms in Disease Ecology
subject: Make your methods reusable once, not per email
body:
Publishing ML methods that ecologists want to use probably means you're fielding "how do I run this on my data?" emails.

I built Ouro to consolidate that into a single API. Other researchers call your method directly instead of recreating it. Document once, they reuse forever.

Happy to show you how it works. Heads upâ€”I'm off Dec 23-Jan 2 if you'd rather connect in January.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
